description: Tấn công 1 đối thủ trong lượt của bản thân
name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>
<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
move user: targets, front, 20
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
else
camera focus: user
zoom: 250%, 20
motion missile: user
wait: 20
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
end
wait for movement
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>
<follow action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
reset zoom
jump user: 200%, 30
move user: return, 30
wait for movement
else
reset zoom
end
</follow action>
